definition: variant of 憤憤|愤愤[fen4 fen4]
variant of 憤憤不平|愤愤不平[fen4 fen4 bu4 ping2]

sentences.english: The Wang Shi lip Yi moved several bottoms, didn't talk, but the facial expression is aggrieved.
sentences.chinese: 王氏嘴唇翳动了几下，没有说话，脸色却忿忿不平。

sentences.english: She flounced out of the room.
He was full of bitterness after he lost his job.
sentences.chinese: 失去工作后他一直忿忿不平。

sentences.english: She said bitterly to me that this was as bad as being praised for punctuality.
sentences.chinese: 她忿忿地对我说，这就跟被称赞守时一样糟糕。

sentences.english: They stand quietly, but secretly they seethe with their anger.
sentences.chinese: 他们默默站着，但心中忿忿。

sentences.english: You can be as mad as a mad dog at the way things went.
sentences.chinese: 你可以像疯狗那样对周围的一切忿忿不平。

sentences.english: Little Liu thinks of a fatty, aggrieved, eat while cursing and scolding way.
sentences.chinese: 小刘想起胖子，就忿忿不平，边吃边咒骂道。

sentences.english: "What unorthodox effort is what you used exactly?"Gu way long Fen Fen however say.
sentences.chinese: “你用的到底是什么邪门功夫？”贾道长忿忿然说道。

sentences.english: Leo sulks that Capricorn is at the head of the table.
sentences.chinese: 狮子座因被摩羯座抢占了餐桌的主位而忿忿不平。

definition: variant of 憤憤不平|愤愤不平[fen4 fen4 bu4 ping2]
gnashing one's teeth (idiom); displaying extreme anger/fuming with rage between gritted teeth
